lines.content: > “Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.” – David Allen ([source](https://boulderbugle.com/quotes-185mla85))
DukePro frees your mind of having to remember things you need to do. It's,
All you need to do is,
4. let it manage your tasks for you :partying_face:
If you Java programmer, you can use it to practice Java too. Here's the `main` method:

* A command to print all the commands available in the chatBot.
* The command that will display the helper lines.
"I currently can record 3 types of tasks. tasks to do, tasks with deadlines and events \n"
+ "Here is how you can record down your events.\n"
+ "To record tasks to do, simply begin your command with \"todo\" "
+ "followed by a space and the task you need to do.\n"
+ "To record tasks with deadlines, simply begin your command with \"deadlines\" "
+ "followed by the task, / and then the due date in DD/MM/YYYY HHmm format.\n"
+ "To record events, simply begin your command with \"events\" followed by the event, "
+ "then \"/to\" with the end time. All times must be in DD/MM/YYYY HHmm format \n"
+ "To view your list of events, type list. \n" + "To mark your events as done or undone, "
+ "followed by the index of the task \n"
+ "To delete tasks from the list, type delete task number, such as delete 2 \n"
+ "You can even filter the list to find certain tasks. Just type \"find\" followed "
+ "by the keyword you want to search"

"I enjoy the work, I enjoy every minute of my professional life.",
"I hate to speak about individuals. Players don't win you trophies, teams win trophies, "
"I need my time to be lonely",
"I am Jose Mourinho and I don't change. I arrive with all my qualities and my defects.",
"Look at the way teams play against Arsenal. They don't believe they can win. They don't believe.",
"Well, uh, I don't know another way than to work at the top level, which is what I do every day.",
"The only thing I would like is to have more control of the game in terms of possession.",
"But I think it's more normal for my team to have no success than it is to "
"So I know all about the ups and downs of football, I know that one day I will be sacked.",
"Please do not call me arrogant, but I am European champion and I think I am the special one.",
"Why have Chelsea suffered so much since I left? Because I left",
"Young players are like melons. Only when you open and taste the melon are you "
+ "100% sure that the melon is good.",
"If the club decide to sack me because of bad results that’s part of the game. "
+ "If it happens I will be a millionaire "
+ "and get another club a couple of months later",
"I have top players and, I’m sorry, we have a top manager."};

* A parser than handles user inputs.
* An enum to store the various commands for ease of parsing into the respective commands.
* The parse function to convert the input, a string, into the respective commands.
* @param input The string input keyed in by the user.
* @param taskList The taskList to store the tasks.
* @param storage The storage to save the new taskList.
* @param ui The ui that prints the messages.
* @return the command that was requested by the user.
public static Command parse(String input, TaskList taskList, Storage storage, Ui ui) {
return new DeleteCommand(taskList, storage, ui, Integer.parseInt(inputs[inputs.length - 1]));
return new MarkCommand(taskList, storage, ui, Integer.parseInt(inputs[inputs.length - 1]));
return new UnMarkCommand(taskList, storage, ui, Integer.parseInt(inputs[inputs.length - 1]));
return new TodoCommand(input, taskList, storage, ui);
return new DeadlineCommand(input, taskList, storage, ui);
return new EventCommand(input, taskList, storage, ui);
return new ErrorCommand("I do not understand. Either I am wrong, or you are wrong,"
return new ErrorCommand("I do not understand. Either I am wrong, or you are wrong, so you are wrong", ui);
